DOC.brief_summary: To collect medium to long-term survivorship implant outcomes on the DePuy Delta Xtend Reverse Shoulder Stystem.
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Following Delta Xtend Reverse Shoulder System
DOC.criteria: Patients whom were implanted with the DePuy Delta Xtend Reverse Total Shoulder System in the time frame indicated. Patients must be willing to sign the consent form and complete all followup visits.
